description: Run SOQL queries to explore and retrieve Salesforce data. Inspect records, fields, and relationships from your workflow. Speed up reporting, auditing, and troubleshooting with fast, targeted results.

clientId.description: Salesforce OAuth2 Client ID (Connected App Consumer Key)

loginUrl.description: Salesforce login URL (use https://test.salesforce.com for sandboxes)

clientSecret.description: Salesforce OAuth2 Client Secret (Connected App Consumer Secret)

capabilities.name: soql_query
capabilities.description: Execute SOQL queries on Salesforce and return results

capabilities.name: get_sobject_describe
capabilities.description: Get metadata about a Salesforce object (fields, relationships, etc.)

capabilities.name: insert_record
capabilities.description: Insert a new record into a Salesforce object. Provide the sobjectType and all field values directly as parameters (not wrapped in recordData).
